Title: Futamono
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Andrew Black (teleplay), Bryan Fuller (teleplay), Scott Nimerfro (teleplay), Steve Lightfoot (teleplay), Andrew Black (story)
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Laurence Fishburne
Plot: A city councilman's body is found intertwined with a tree; Jack crashes Hannibal's dinner party to investigate Will's suspicions; a revelation shocks everyone.
